parameters.name: AppName
parameters.description: The name of the application to which the live stream belongs.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The time range specified by the EndTime and StartTime parameters cannot exceed **one** day. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The number of snapshots to return per call. Valid values: **1 to 100**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description:
The sort order. Valid values:

*   **asc** (default): ascending order
*   **desc**: descending order

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: StreamName
parameters.description: The name of the live stream.
